lead_paragraph: LANE--Stanley L.,M.D., DDS, died peacefully at the age of 99 on March 1, 2016. Beloved husband, devoted father, grandfather, brother and uncle. Distinguished maxillofacial surgeon respected by his peers at the many hospitals with which he was affiliated. Revered by patients for his surgical skill and kind care. Proud graduate of NYU Medical School (1939) and Columbia Dental School (1941). A member of the greatest generation, served his country as an army surgeon during WWII. Predeceased by his first wife Sylvia Lane, the mother of his children Stanley (Ina) Lane and Sandra (Jonathan) Ballan. He leaves behind his grieving wife Alice Lane and her children Karyn (Scott) Goffin, Adam (Marni) Gronski, and Jennifer (Craig) Sabal. He is already missed by his grandchildren Barrett and Darren Lane, Sarah, Jamie, Scott and Joseph Ballan, Alec and Zachary Goffin, Bennet Gronski, and Jonah, Allegra and Emilia Sabal. Also mourned by his brother Dr. Jules Lane and many nieces and nephews. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  LANE, STANLEY L.
